TopicTitle: Location of start-up screen on MÃƒÂ¼n

Articles.Content:
Hello! I have been wondering about this for a while and thought I'd finally ask it...

As all of you know, the start up screen is a Kerbal, a crashed rocket, and a beautiful MÃƒÂ¼nar landscape. My question is this: Where is that beautiful background on the MÃƒÂ¼n? I would love to land there. Thanks for your help!
Yeah, I don't think that location is actually in the game. If it is though, good luck finding it :-)

I also think it's not on the Mun. When going back and forth between those two menus, it looks like the sky is painted on walls just behind the hills and little Kerbin is floating in the corner. I have even found a star which is covered by Kerbin in one menu and not covered in the other menu (I had to enhance contrast of the image to see that).

But assuming I'm wrong, it could be anywhere on the circle on the Mun where Kerbin is just at the right height above the horizon. And taking Kerbin orientation into account, you're actually left to just one place.

Edited October 31, 2013 by Kasuha
